```{r data cleaning}
pell <- read.csv("./pell.csv") %>% 
    rename(
        state = STATE,
        award = AWARD,
        recipient = RECIPIENT,
        name = NAME,
        session = SESSION,
        year = YEAR
    ) %>% 
    filter(year==2017) %>% 
    select(!(name:session)) %>% 
    group_by(state) %>% 
    summarise_at(c("award", "recipient"), sum, na.rm = TRUE) %>% 
    mutate(
        award_rank=rank(award, ties.method="random"),
        recipient_rank=rank(recipient, ties.method="random")
    )
```
